edge: Cooper became the male lead while in final talks to make his directorial debut at the end of March 2016.
On November 9, 2016, it was reported that Ray Liotta was in talks to join the film in the role of the manager to Cooper's character, though he ultimately was not involved.
On March 17, 2017, Sam Elliott joined the film,
In April 2017, Rafi Gavron, Michael Harney, and Rebecca Field also joined the cast,
In May, Dave Chappelle was cast in the film,
In April 2018, it was announced that Halsey would have a small role.
Filming for A Star Is Born began on April 17, 2017.
Subsequently, Nelson met Lady Gaga and began writing songs with her.
The soundtrack for A Star Is Born, performed by Gaga and Cooper, was released on October 5, 2018.

The studio announced that the album 'Call Me By Your Name' was released on October 5, 2018, by Interscope Records. The album features 19 songs in a wide range of musical styles + 15 dialogue tracks that will take you on a journey that mirrors the experience of seeing the film.
